entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 p.m. MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h except east 100 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Blizzard. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 40 km/h except east 80 near the Richardson mountains. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h except east 70 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023
